name: Dwarven Delve - An Action Dungeon Crawl with a Twist
blurb: It's Diablo meets Pipe Mania! An Action Puzzle Crawl in which you change the dungeon layout on the fly using rotating tunnel sections.

rewards.reward:
Founding Delver
============================= Digital download of the game +
Name on Founders Stone at DwarvenDelve.com +
Deluxe Digital Art Pack (wall papers, avatars, icons)

Vanguard ============================= Beta access for playtesting + Name in game credits + One game + Name on Founders Stone at DwarvenDelve.com + Deluxe Digital Art Pack (wall papers, avatars, icons)

Deep Scout ============================= Alpha Access + "Into the Deep" A Dwarven Delve adventure for OGL d20 tabletop RPGs-\r\nDiscover secrets of the Deep in this original adventure written by the creators of Dwarven Delve + One game + Name on Founders Stone + Deluxe Digital Art Pack + Beta access +\r\nName in game credits

Loremaster ============================ SPECIAL: Printable Set of Dungeon Tiles\u2014comprised of all shipping tile sets\u2014for use in your tabletop RPG  DIGITAL: One game + Name on Founders Stone +\r\nDeluxe Digital Art Pack + Beta access + Name in game credits + Alpha Access + Into the Deep, A Dwarven Delve adventure for OGL d20 tabletop

Clan Scion ========================== SPECIAL: Dwarf Yourself : Meet with TinkerHouse online to create your very own dwarven ancestor based on your likeness if you want). The ancestor will be included in the game as a member of oner of the six clans from the storyline.
Digital: One game +
Name on Founders Stone + Deluxe Digital Art Pack
+ Beta access for playtesting + Name in game credits + Alpha Playtest + Into the Deep, a Dwarven Delve adventure for OGL d20 tabletop +
Printable Set of Dungeon Tiles comprised of all shipping tile sets + Digital Art book with concept and final art + PHYSICAL: Delver’s Journal: 5 postcards will be mailed weekly from the dwarves, describing their adventures, observations, and featuring a unique area from the game.

Clan Elder; Keeper of Portents ========================== SPECIAL: \r\nTHG VIP: Come to TinkerHouse for the day and hang out with the gang. (Must provide own transportation.) + Associate producer credit + Design your very own monster that will appear in the shipping game! + Dwarf Yourself : Meet with TinkerHouse online to create your very own dwarven ancestor based on your likeness if you want). The ancestor will be included in the game as a member of oner of the six clans from the storyline. + Digital: All Add-Ons + One game + Name on Founders Stone + Deluxe Digital Art Pack+ Beta access + Name in credits + Alpha Playtest + Into the Deep, A Dwarven Delve adventure for OGL d20 tabletop + Printable Set of Dungeon Tiles comprised of all shipping tile sets + Digital Art book with concept and final art + PHYSICAL: Delver\u2019s Journal: 5 postcards will be mailed weekly from the dwarves, describing their adventures, observations, and featuring a unique area from the game.
